Posts.EditableText: Another recent thread made me wonder if Quest supports character-mode input (i.e. you press a key and it inputs automatically without you pressing the enter key). I did some searching here and didn't find anything. so does anyone know if this is possible or if it's been done? If Quest doesn't support it natively what is the JS workaround?

Posts.EditableText: Attached is one way to do it. It has a simple JavaScript function that hooks the keyboard on the GameContent element and sends an ASLEvent to the passed function when any key is pressed (including things like Shift and Control). Perhaps that can be modified for your needs. Note that you get keys always, even if the user is entering commands into the command line.
